Name: White Mystic Robe
Description: A ethereal robe that imbues its wearer with the enigmatic knowledge of the arcane arts.

Name: White Templar Tunic
Description: A noble tunic, worn by the valiant templars who combat darkness and protect the realm.

Name: White Sage Robe
Description: A wise robe that emanates a calm aura, offering its wearer protection from magical harm.

Name: White Priest Tunic
Description: A divine tunic, donned by those with unwavering faith, guiding souls through perilous trials.

Name: White Earthwarden Robe
Description: A harmonious robe that reverberates with the strength of the earth, fortifying its wearer's resilience.

Name: Majestic Flower Robe
Description: An exquisite robe adorned with pristine flowers, amplifying the mystic might of its divine possessor.

Name: White Nomad Tunic
Description: A modest tunic tailored for wandering souls, who roam the world in pursuit of greater truths.

Name: White Windwalker Robe
Description: A gossamer robe that grants its bearer the fleet-footed grace of a spirit borne upon the winds.

Name: White Fur Pelt
Description: A pristine white pelt that exudes warmth and comfort, molding to the body of a seasoned adventurer.

Name: White Winged Demon
Description: An awe-inspiring armor, festooned with white feathered wings, granting supernatural agility to evade adversaries.

Name: Fur Pelt
Description: A luxurious white fur pelt that enwraps the body, shielding its wearer from the harsh elements.

Name: White Leather Armor
Description: A splendid leather breastplate embellished with fine silverwork.

Name: Ivory Chainmail
Description: A well-crafted chainmail vest decorated with delicate engravings.

Name: Pearly Scalemail
Description: A glittering scalemail tunic made of gleaming mother-of-pearl plates.

Name: Snowy Plate
Description: A sturdy platemail cuirass crafted from the finest steel and enchanted with frigid magic.

Name: Frosty Brigandine
Description: A rough brigandine jerkin made of thick wool and lined with frostbitten leather.
